question: Is retinol binding protein 4 an adipokine?
ideal_answer:
Yes,
Retinol-binding protein 4 (RBP4) is a prominent adipokine.

snippets.text: Systematic Quantification of Neurotrophic Adipokines RBP4, PEDF, and Clusterin in Human Cerebrospinal Fluid and Serum.
Retinol-binding protein 4 (RBP4) is a prominent adipokine i
Fetuin-A and retinol-binding protein 4 (RBP4) are secreted as both hepatokine and adipokine.
